entries.journal_entry_description: Yraka Nes mentioned that she had an old cybernetic part she used to use just lying around. However, she needs to fix it before it could be of any use to someone. She needs healing resin and the only substance close enough is from the Mother Queen. Defeat the Mother Queen and bring back the resin. She can be found in the Deep Depths.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Find the Mother Queen in the Deep Depths and destroy her to obtain the healing salve.
